name: eBay Dark Black Midnight Smacked
description:
American Site with some international support.
I plan to keep this updated as it gets better.
i am also a seller and buyer on ebay so I cover lots of it.
submit code if you want. i might update it.

forked from this great style https://userstyles.org/styles/79440/ebay-bayofblack


check out all my patented* "Midnight Smacked" userstyles:
https://userstyles.org/users/300753

*userstyles not really patented, they are free candy!
additional_info: started changing it and making it better so i started a fork.
